title: Trend Stein 8/18: U.S. Soccer, Ben Stein, Leftovers, Starbucks, California, E-Hallpass
itunes:title: Trend Stein 8/18: U.S. Soccer, Ben Stein, Leftovers, Starbucks, California, E-Hallpass
description:
In this edition of Trend Stein, Jack and Miles discuss the U.S. Soccer Team jerseys, Ben Stein's hot takes, fast food chains selling us leftovers in a bowl, a federal judge enforcing the law in a Starbucks union case, California letting kids sleep a little later, and the E-Hallpass system!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
